thread.section_title: ChinaFlower214 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 ChinaFlower214 的点评意见 | www.chinaflower214.com
thread.title: Peter Barry
thread.title_full: ChinaFlower214 的点评人 Peter Barry

author: Peter Barry
title: Peter Barry
text:
I have used China Flowers a couple of times now. They make sending flowers incredibly simple and worry free and the recipient is always happy with the outcome.
PayPal payment is a helpful extra.
Prices are very reasonable.
If you're looking to send flowers to someone in China, this service is far better than some of the traditional international flower services.
